programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Hamburger Postulate: Leonard thinks he's been wasting his time on Penny, so he turns his attention to Leslie. Sheldon's uncomfortable with a change to his hamburger routine. (S1 Ep5/17)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: A New Weather Girl and a Stay-at-Home Coddler: Mandy gets a new job opportunity. Sheldon worries that he's falling behind. Georgie takes his daughter to work. (S6 Ep19)

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.desc: German for Beginners and a Crazy Old Man with a Bat: The gambling room gets broken into. Sheldon wants to study abroad. And Missy makes a new friend. (S6 Ep20)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Family Portrait: It's family picture day and everything that can go wrong, does. (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Old Wagon: Claire finally gets Phil to agree to sell their old station wagon, but not before everyone takes it on one last ride down memory lane. (S2 Ep1)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Wedding for Disaster: Homer and Marge discover that they're not officially married when Reverend Lovejoy finds out he wasn't a licensed minister at the time of their ceremony. (S20 Ep15/21)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Eeny Teeny Maya Moe: Homer takes Maggie to Moe's and accidentally leaves her in the playground outside the bar. Meanwhile, Moe's delighted to get to know a young woman online. (S20 Ep16/21)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Bad Fish Paradigm: Penny opens up to a reluctant Sheldon after a less-than-stellar first date with Leonard, putting him in the awkward position of having to keep a secret. (S2 Ep1)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Codpiece Topology: Seeing Penny out on a date with another guy sends a distressed Leonard rushing back to Leslie Winkle, much to Sheldon's dismay. (S2 Ep2)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Barbarian Sublimation: Penny becomes addicted to an online game based on the world of Conan the Barbarian and begins to pester Sheldon for advice. (S2 Ep3)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: In Marge We Trust: Homer discovers that a Japanese dishwashing powder company is using his face as its logo. And Marge dishes out advice to the church's parishioners. (S8 Ep22/25)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: I, Carumbus: The Simpsons go to Ancient Rome. Homer's a gladiator, and Bart becomes madder than Caligula. (S32 Ep2)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: We're on the Road to D'oh-where: Homer misses a Moe's Tavern trip to Las Vegas when he has to drive Bart to juvenile delinquent camp. (S17 Ep11/22)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: My Fair Laddy: Lisa tries to transform Groundskeeper Willie into a gentleman after his shack collapses and he's forced to move in with the Simpsons. (S17 Ep12/22)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Seemingly Never-Ending Story: When Homer and Lisa get trapped in a cave, she tells him about a day she spent with Mr Burns after a goat chased her into his mansion. (S17 Ep13/22)

programme.desc: School District 9: When a career-predicting machine tells Owen he has no skills to offer the world, Owen finds a way to prove the machine wrong in the most Owen way possible. (S2 Ep52)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Gumbearable: After accidentally swallowing a piece of gum, Owen has to protect his friends by jumping into a gum volcano. (S3 Ep1)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Whack Mirror: Chef warns Beth and Cody that making goofy faces into a mirror will cause them to get stuck that way. It turns out he was right, just not in the way any of them ever imagined. (S3 Ep2)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Broken Back Kotter: Izzy nominates Chef for the Daycare Professional of the Year award and will do whatever it takes to see him win. As it turns out, it takes a lot. (S3 Ep3)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Weekend at Buddy's: After Cody's best friend doll breaks on their watch, Owen and Beth put themselves in grave danger while trying to do the right thing. (S3 Ep4)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: MacArthur Park: After losing countless jobs because of the kids, MacArthur shows up at the school seeking revenge. (S3 Ep5)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Mirror, Mirror on the Wall: While salmon fishing on the riverbank, Grizzy hauls in an unusual catch: an old hand mirror straight out of a fairy tale. (S1 Ep76)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy the Wizard: The Lemmings find a magic stick that makes objects come alive. Grizzy is sure the stick would save him a lot of work, the only problem is how to get it from the Lemmings. (S1 Ep77)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Moonwalk Bear: Grizzy tries to stop the Lemmings playing with fireworks. (S1 Ep78)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Polar Bear: Nutty Hill is suffering from a heat wave. Searching for a bit of cool air, Grizzy has a brilliant idea. He'll get into the fridge, where the temperature will be more bearable. (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Spread: Grizzy is frustrated: just as he was about to coat a nice big fresh salmon with chocolate spread and snuggle up in front of the TV, he discovers that the pantry is empty! (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Cellular Bear: Grizzy's nap is interrupted by the forest ranger's cell phone. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Jurassic Bear: Freed by the thawing ice, a giant egg slides up to the front door of the cabin. The lemmings watch the hatching of a baby dinosaur that soon thinks they are its parents. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Extreme Fitness: In order to woo the she-bear he's infatuated with, Grizzy decides to take things in hand and get into shape with the ranger's bodybuilding equipment. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Domestic Robots: Grizzy discovers that the ranger's new robot vacuum cleaner also gives very pleasant back massages, but the lemmings see the new gadget more as competition... (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Mass Control: While searching for the television remote control, Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Under Control: To make sure that the lemmings don't snatch his chocolate spread while he's taking his nap, Grizzy turns the fridge into a safe - combination lock and all. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Popcorn Party: The lemmings have invented a new popcorn game. When Grizzy notices that his she-bear seems to be drawn by the smell, he invites her over for a snack, just the two of them. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Catalyst: It's Heroes' Day in Paris and everyone must do a good deed for the occasion, but Hawk Moth akumatizes Nathalie into Catalyst to put his plan into action. (S2 Ep25)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Mayura: Hawk Moth reakumatizes all his former villains with Catalyst's help. Will Ladybug and her team of superheroes manage to defeat Hawk Moth and his army? (S2 Ep26)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: Under Water Pressure: The Mermicornos encounter a creature that plays on their anxieties. Meanwhile, Sawtooth attempts to drain the last fallen star. (S1 Ep112)

programme.title: Unicorn Academy
programme.desc: Under Starglow Lake: When grim magic contaminates the academy's water supply, the unicorns risk losing their power unless Sophia can save Starglow Lake with an unlikely ally. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: It Takes Two To Talent: Felicity can't decide what to do for the Mythlandia Talent Contest, while Miguel channels his guitar skills. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Pot Luck: Felicity creates a rainbow, causing a leprechaun named Paddy to appear. When Paddy discovers there's no gold to guard, Felicity helps him find a new job. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dream Worriers: Izzy forgets the ending to her most amazing dream of all time, so the kids travel into her mind to find out what happened. (S2 Ep22)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Grody To The Maximum: Cody gets a super cool new t-shirt. It's so cool that the kids don't even recognise him, so Cody jumps on the chance to leave his old life behind and become popular. (S2 Ep23)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Wiggin' Out: Bridgette donates her hair to a charity that makes wigs for hairless cats and now some classmates want to do the same. (S2 Ep24)

programme.title: Shasha and Milo: Shorts
programme.desc: Minion Life: The Minions struggle to complete a mission for Luca. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Shasha and Milo: Shorts
programme.desc: 100% Human-ish: An energetic Bong Bong intrudes on Shasha's sleep. (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Shasha and Milo: Shorts
programme.desc: DJ Haskell's Dance Off: Beats drop in a hero and villain dance off. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Shasha and Milo: Shorts
programme.desc: Sundae's Best: Luca is not impressed by Sundae's latest inventions... (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Shasha and Milo: Shorts
programme.desc: Multiplying Minions: Sundae's multiplying device proves you really can be your own worst enemy. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: Under Water Pressure: The Mermicornos encounter a creature that plays on their anxieties. Meanwhile, Sawtooth attempts to drain the last fallen star. (S1 Ep112)

programme.title: Unicorn Academy
programme.desc: Mended Hearts: Without the help of their teachers, the students must work together to take on the evil Ravenzella all by themselves. Unicorn Academy depends on it! (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: The Green-Eyed Monster: Miguel invites Chippy, a cute chipmunk-like creature, to join him and Felicity on their friend-iversary, but Chippy isn't all she seems! (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Nobody's Purrfect: Felicity tries a little too hard to be purrfect and somehow loses both her powers and her confidence. (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dream Worriers: Izzy forgets the ending to her most amazing dream of all time, so the kids travel into her mind to find out what happened. (S2 Ep22)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Wiggin' Out: Bridgette donates her hair to a charity that makes wigs for hairless cats and now some classmates want to do the same. (S2 Ep24)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Upside Of Hunger: Owen has a mishap while baking an upside-down cake and is transported to an upside-down world where he is forced to outwit himself in order to get his cake back. (S2 Ep25)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Fire In The Hole: Duncan cooks up a nuclear hot sauce to mess with Chef, but accidentally summons Terry Spice, King of the Underworld! (S2 Ep26)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Tu Ba Or Not Tu Ba: The class tries to help Chef achieve his dream of joining the world's most famous Tuba Band, Tubalicious, only to regret it when they realise how much they'll miss him. (S2 Ep27)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dude Where's Macaw: While trying to defend his elite gamer status, Chef uses an old cheat code that brings a dangerous avatar to life. (S2 Ep28)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Way Back Wendel: Courtney must deliberately lose a challenge or let the entire world go back in time. It's a hard choice for her. (S2 Ep29)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Stingin' In The Rain: When Chef gets locked outside during a storm, the kids mistakenly assume he's a robber and decide to protect the Daycare - by any means necessary. (S2 Ep30)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Cartoon Realism: Gwen is frustrated by Beth's silly belief that cartoons are real, but they visit an animation studio and discover that Beth is right! (S2 Ep31)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Oww: When the kids discover Chef's past as a disgraced pro wrestler, they invite his old tag team partner to help put on a charity show. But is the big match about reunion or revenge?! (S2 Ep32)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Jelly Aches: The school descends into chaos after getting a visit from Gazunga, the Jealousy Troll. (S2 Ep33)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Fish Called Leshawna: After eating some mystery fish sticks, Leshawna achieves every little girl's dream and transforms into a mermaid! (S2 Ep45)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Double Oh Beth: With most of the class already gone for spring break, a villain infiltrates the school. Luckily a sleeper agent has been lying in wait. Hold on... it's Beth?!? Oh boy... (S2 Ep46)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Duncan Duty: When Duncan realises Chef is getting kids to tattle on him in return for chocolate milk, he sees an opportunity. (S2 Ep47)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Snack To The Future: Owen wants his favourite treat, 'Jiggle Giggle', so bad that he's uses a time machine to get to snack time quicker. (S2 Ep40)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Encore'tney: When Courtney turns to a magical datebook to help her achieve perfection, she's trapped in a never-ending loop until a friend teaches her a valuable lesson. (S2 Ep48)

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: From Below: Axel and Luka are home alone when Dr Nautilus builds a creature made of tentacles which invades the house. (S1 Ep35)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Itch: Grizzy discovers that the frenzied dance the lemmings are doing is actually due to the fleas they are infested with. When Grizzy catches them too, it's panic all round! (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Thirst Quencher: It's another heatwave and even the riverbed has dried up. A very thirsty Grizzy discovers that the lemmings have used the last of the water to fill their inflatable pool. (S1 Ep14)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Spider Lemmings: The lemmings have caught a spider and her sticky, elastic threads are perfect for bungee jumping, but Grizzy discovers that he has arachnophobia. (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: The Loch Mess Monster: Miguel is so messy that a creature named the Loch Mess Monster moves in with him. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty

programme.title: LEGO Friends: The Next Chapter

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: Another World. 1963. Stars Rupert Davies, Clare Kelly & Alan MacNaughtan. When investigating the murder of millionaire David Ward, Maigret enters another world, where money is lord of all. [S]

programme.title: Valentino
programme.desc: 1951. Biography. Directed by Lewis Allen. Stars Eleanor Parker, Otto Kruger & Anthony Dexter. The story of Rudolph Valentino and his rise from obscurity to fame, and the struggles that followed. [S]

programme.title: Harrison's Flowers
programme.desc: 2000. Drama. Directed by Elie Chouraqui. Stars Andie MacDowell, Elias Koteas & Brendan Gleeson. When a photojournalist disappears in war torn Yugoslavia, his wife travels to Europe to find him. [S]

programme.title: Richard Diamond: Private Detective
programme.desc: East of Danger. 1960. Stars David Janssen, Russ Conway & Judy Dan. Diamond investigates when an antique dealer discovers that his warehouse is being used to store heroin.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The Case of the Belligerent Ghost. 1954. Starring: Ronald Howard, Howard Marion-Crawford & Archie Duncan. When Dr. Watson sees a ghost, Sherlock Holmes is lead to a crime at an art museum. [S]

programme.title: Cloak Without Dagger
programme.desc: 1956. Thriller. Director: Joseph Sterling. Stars Philip Friend, Mary Mackenzie & Leslie Dwyer. During WW2, a Major misses out on the capture of a spy. Years later, the truth is revealed. [S]

programme.title: The Monkey's Paw
programme.desc: 1948. Horror. A curio dealer sells a monkey's paw that can grant the possessor three wishes but warns that disaster will follow. Starring Michael Martin-Harvey, Sydney Tafler & Alfie Bass. [S]

programme.title: The Man in Black
programme.desc: 1950. Thriller. Director: Francis Searle. Stars Betty Ann Davies, Sheila Burrell, Sid James. After a man's untimely death, his second wife tries to drive his daughter insane to inherit his estate. [S]

programme.title: The Assassination Bureau
programme.desc: 1969. Comedy. Director: Basil Dearden. Stars Oliver Reed, Diana Rigg & Telly Savalas. Before WWI, a journalist investigates the Assassination Bureau, which chose its targets based on moral issues. [S]

programme.title: Blanche Fury
programme.desc: 1948. Crime. Director: Marc Allegret, Stars Valerie Hobson, Stewart Granger & Michael Gough. Penniless governess Blanche Fullerton takes a job at the estate of her rich relations, the Fury family. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Robin and his Juliet - Part 1. 1973. Stars Maureen Lipman, Jane Lapotaire & Garfield Morgan. School teacher Juliet Tomlin is charged with gross indecency with one of her pupils, a 15 year old boy. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Robin and his Juliet - Part 2. 1973. Stars Victor Brooks & Margaret Robertson. John Gilroy speaks about his suspicions and his attempts to end the friendship, and Robin Gilroy gives his evidence. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Robin and his Juliet - Part 3. 1973. Stars Christopher Gray, Daphne Oxenford & Maureen Lipman. Dr. Eva Penny cautions that some of Robin's account may be fantasy and Juliet Tomlin takes the stand. [S]

programme.title: The Wrong Arm Of the Law
programme.desc: 1963. Comedy. Director: Cliff Owen. Stars Peter Sellers, Lionel Jeffries, Bernard Cribbins & Nanette Newman. A gangster learns of a traitor in his midst and makes a deal with the police. [S]

programme.title: Devil's Bait
programme.desc: 1959. Drama. Director: Peter Graham Scott. Stars Geoffey Keen, Jane Hylton & Gordon Jackson. An incompetent rat-catcher leaves behind the poison he has used to eradicate rats from a small bakery. [S]

programme.title: The Cheaters

programme.title: The Brothers

programme.title: Travelling Man

programme.title: The Gold Robbers

programme.title: The Glass

programme.title: Voyage to the Planet of Prehistoric Women

programme.title: Voyage to the Planet of Prehistoric Women
programme.desc: 1968. Sci-fi. Director: Peter Bogdanovich. Stars Mamie Van Doren & Mary Marr. When a group of astronauts land on Venus they are surprised to find dangerous creatures and beautiful women. [S]

programme.title: The Party's Over

programme.title: The Star and the Story: Ferry to Fox Island

programme.title: Freedom To Die

programme.title: Night Ride

programme.title: Look At Life Single-Handed Sailors

programme.title: Of Human Bondage

programme.title: As Long as They're Happy

programme.title: Broken Journey

programme.title: The Man In The Iron Mask
